title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements for MonitorAirePortatil, including functionality, design, performance, and usability specifications.

title: Design MonitorAirePortatil Architecture
description: Create a high-level architecture design for the MonitorAirePortatil device, including hardware, software, and communication specifications.

title: Develop User Interface for MonitorAirePortatil
description: Design and implement the user interface for MonitorAirePortatil, ensuring an intuitive and easy-to-use experience for the end-user.

title: Implement Device Firmware for Air Quality Sensors
description: Develop and integrate the firmware for the air quality sensors within the MonitorAirePortatil device.

title: Integrate Wireless Communication Module
description: Integrate a wireless communication module into the MonitorAirePortatil device, enabling it to send data to the cloud platform.

title: Develop Cloud Platform for Data Storage and Alerts
description: Create a cloud platform for storing air quality data collected by the MonitorAirePortatil devices, as well as managing user alerts.

title: Test MonitorAirePortatil Components
description: Perform unit tests on each component of the MonitorAirePortatil device, including air quality sensors, wireless communication module, and user interface.
dependencies: Implement Device Firmware for Air Quality Sensors
Develop Cloud Platform for Data Storage and Alerts

title: Perform System Integration Testing
description: Test the integration between components of the MonitorAirePortatil device, ensuring seamless data flow and proper functioning of all parts.

title: Prepare Technical Documentation
description: Write and compile the technical documentation for MonitorAirePortatil, detailing its design, assembly, usage, and troubleshooting procedures.
dependencies: Implement Device Firmware for Air Quality Sensors
Develop Cloud Platform for Data Storage and Alerts

title: Conduct Security Audit of MonitorAirePortatil
description: Evaluate the security vulnerabilities of MonitorAirePortatil, ensuring that sensitive data is protected and the device is secure against potential threats.
dependencies: Implement Device Firmware for Air Quality Sensors
Develop Cloud Platform for Data Storage and Alerts
